Name: Colonize Prologue
About the game: / / Colonize Prologue is a combination of survival game and building strategy that takes place during the colonization period - the 17th century. It tells the story of a settlement in the new world and all the difficulties encountered by the early settlers. Overview Colonize Prologue is a building simulation and it centers on the economy, management of groups of the population, city management. It is an isometric classic. The player gradually builds a settlement, a city that has a character of a city-state, with everything that goes with it. External missions are another feature that will increase your experience. The player chooses a mission in his city in the respective building, chooses 5 inhabitants for the mission, and sends them into the wilderness! Colonize Prologue is an intro to a full feature game. You can play our first map - Plymouth, and experience a small portion of what will be done in the full feature COLONIZE game, that we will publish in 2022. Key features The player fights against hunger and weather! Trade with the King! The external missions that will expand your game! F.A.Q How to make babies? They need to live in a house for a while. Both parents need to have 60+ happiness and the woman has to be younger than the age of 45. Why is no one eating? The first condition is to have someone at the INN, the second one is to make it open so other citizens are not working at the same time. So for example, let the INN be open through 4 am, so citizens will go after work to the INN and eat. Something is wrong with my health? Usually, it means, you are not giving them time to go to INN to eat or maybe they are old and waiting for the inevitable. What will be the price of full feature Colonize? The price is not yet decided. When will be the release date of the full feature Colonize? The release date of the full feature Colonize game will be decided in the upcoming months. How to save the game? The demo - Colonize Prologue does not have this option right now. Why did you release Colonize Prologue? Mainly to gain feedback from the community, from you guys. To improve the game together! This game is supported using public funding by the Slovak Arts Council.
